title: The Source Hip-Hop Music Awards 1999 [1999] 320kbps
description:
Album Info

Includes some of the biggest hits of the year from 1999. From Jay-Z's "Can I Get A...," Eminem's "My Name Is," Silkk the Shocker's "It Ain't My Fault," and Juvenile's "Ha," to the Roots' "You Got Me," Busta Rhymes' "Party Is Goin' on Over Here" and Method Man's "Break Ups 2 Make Ups," The Source Hip-Hop Music Awards 1999 indeed features many of the most popular hip-hop acts of the year. It's definitely one of the best summations of hip-hop in 1999 brought out yet, though the big artists not included (DMX, Lauryn Hill, Missy Elliott) are missed in a big way.
